item.title: Andr√© Dietrich
item.description: Originally a robotics and embedded software developer now working as a researcher at the Technical University Bergakademie in Freiberg.

item.title: Sebastian Zug
item.description: Sebastian Zug is a Professor at the TU Bergakademie Freiberg. His research interests are focused on outdoor robotics and self-describing, intelligent components.
